column1:
The information requested below relates to non-consolidated performance related payments (NCPRP) for the performance year 2013-14 only. 
Do not include any payments that relate to performance for year 2014-15.
Please ensure you have read the accompanying guidance notes before attempting to complete this template.
column6: NB: Main departments should co-ordinate returns for all their relevant agencies in scope for this exercise and send to Cabinet Office one return that contains a line of information for each organisation.
